doc.field: Acquisition of Estate Collection/Munn Memorial Collection - Correspondence Includes correspondence, chronology describing the acquisition of the Munn Papers; Memorandum, c. Feb., 1977 by Jacob D. Goldstein detailing the history of the Estate Collection; "Major Achievements in the Archives Since Last Meeting of the Council," by Bayrd Still. Correspondents include Jacob D. Goldstein, Harley P. Holden, Hyman Lehon, Clifford H. Shipton, Bayrd Still. See also: Professor Still files for post-1978 correspondence.
